I don't want to assert this too soon, but this is possibly the most awesome game ever made.

One of the only flaws this game has really, is that it has the most annoying trope that keeps popping up, that is so cliche, played out, and passe: "Yakuza 0 is awesome" trope. The most tiring part of wasting so much time having lots of fun was that everything was immersive and engaging in gameplay and presentation. 

It was also extremely repetitive. It just wouldn't stop blowing my mind and I was getting so tired of it. Does this game just feel the need to be really cool all the time? It's a lil extra, but if that's your thing, go for it.

One of my favorite games for sure. It's not without it's flaws, but I definitely enjoy it a lot. | I’ve been gifting this game to randos in my friend list cause it deserves to be played. Just make sure u do the Side Stories for each character, those upgrades are essential | Yakuza 0 é um jogo que eu já havia zerado anteriormente e indiscutivelmente é um jogo muito bom. A quantidade de coisas que tu tem pra fazer no jogo são imensas e mesmo com quase 100 horas de jogo ainda não consegui completar tudo o que tem pra fazer no game. Vale muito a experiência e recomendo como primeiro contato para quem nunca jogou nenhum jogo da série. (a única coisa que me incomoda um pouco seria o fato de que você vai ter que aprender a jogar Mahjong para poder platinar, mas ai vai de quem querer platinar esse jogo mesmo) | 其实早就打完剧情部分了，不过感觉很难找到足够丰富的词汇描述这部游戏所以一直没写评价，因为它实在是太出色了！
作为我的如龙入坑作，它真的太精彩了，它肯定是我玩到现在剧情最好以及主角性格刻画最出彩的JRPG。而且很难得的是，作为一部群像剧，它在主角形象塑造得很棒的同时还创造了大量形象鲜明的配角，某些只出现几次的角色也能做到让人记住性格特点；同时，支线任务里也有相当一部分内含不错的短剧情。
所以我要开始接着玩了！我已经迫不及待去看桐生和真岛在接下来的时代里到底发生了怎样的故事（ | I tried writing a short review and kept making it too long. I tried playing a short game about organized crime in Japan and ended it with 60+ hours.

Surprising is the word I would use to summarize this game, in a good way. I am surprised that they charged me 8 fucking dollars for this. I am shocked it ended up being one of the most serious and also stupidest games I've ever played. I am gob smacked that this game managed to make me cry while also making me laugh.

I am stunned that you might be reading this review instead of just experiencing the game for yourself.

Final thoughts, I can't wait to see the rest of the games. I also can't believe I've had this game sitting on a figurative shelf for nearly 4 years before playing it. It's not a deep game in the slightest but that works to its advantage I'd say.

Game Name: Total War: ROME II - Emperor Edition
Reviews:
So, this might actually be my favorite Total War game.

I know, I know...someone is recoiling at the thought that I didn't say it was the original, Atilla, etc...but this one just works for me. I don't think Rome I could have had a more worthy successor, all things considered. Did it have a poor launch and could there be some more improvements to make it even better? Yes, and yes...but even now after Warhammer and all the rest, I hold this one to be the Modern Total War Gold Standard.

I've played it so much over the years since launch. I don't even know how many hours since they kept getting reset back in the day, but going by the current tally I know it is A LOT. The controls and combat are pretty intuitive for [i]old[/i] Total War players like myself and for the more modern players. In fact, a lot of the systems you see in later titles got their starts here, so if nothing else Rome II has that going for it.

The setting is just a really dynamic period in history and lends itself well to being able to experience completely different playstyles with the varying factions. There are other Total War games where, as a consequence of when and where they are set, you really all just fight with the same roster of units. That is not the case here. Yes, there are plenty of reskins to be found, but even those aren't always 1:1. The "jack of all trades" faction here is, unsurprisingly, Rome. Meanwhile, there are other factions whose rosters focus on more niche that really make them play completely differently. There are some factions that pretty much only rely on cavalry while others heavily encourage long lines of pikes and hoplites. This alone makes the game very replayble since you can hop into something very different whilst keeping all of the familiarity of all of these modernized Total War mechanics...at least modernized circa the last major update.

The campaign map is a fun strategy-management game in of itself, but the battles are where things really shine. You have land and naval combat here, something that wasn't possible in the original title, but had to come from the likes of Empire: Total War. Combat here doesn't play like that other game, though. It is much more of the time focusing on boarding, ramming, and burning. Once on land, combat feels fairly satisfying. You can really develop good strategies with certain army rosters. The AI is, well, still AI, but overall it does tend to give you a reasonable enough challenge. Of the Total Wars, this one is definitely in the decent to good AI camp.

I can't really speak for the multiplayer quality, as it is not something I ever really participated in; however, I can point to the fairly reliable number of active players as indication that, at the very least, there are always people in the greater Rome II community to engage with.

Yes, I could really go on and on about this game, but if there were only one thing I could leave you with it would be this:

I have played every total war game (except Three Kingdoms and that weird mobile one, but I digress), and out of all of those games THIS is the one that I always come back to. I just think it is neat.

With all this said, [i]I highly recommend picking this up,[/i] but if you do so I do recommend going ahead and getting it in a bundle with the DLCs...on sale, preferably. 

It's not that the base game is barren without the extra content; but, as someone who has put hundreds of hours into it, I really can't imagine playing the game without that extra content.

Unfortunately, in a lot of ways it is still too little too late, and if you look at what Creative Assembly has released in the series following this they did not learn their lessons from the failures of this game and have since doubled down on those failures. A clear example of the limits of AI design.

Second Second succeeds in creating a unique take on a turn based card strategy featuring minimal RNG, but ultimately fails to engage the player. Game balance being handled by neural nets has devolved many encounters into complete nonsense, with many enemies doing nothing but healing themselves for the entire fight.

The time-based combat system is unique and interesting and not as complicated as most of the feedback would have you believe, but the mediocre english translation makes it more difficult to pick up. That said the encounters do not tap the potential of this system in the slightest. Your deck will be slow to progress and mature, and often you will spend most encounters executing the same overpowered card combo that you set up before-hand to exploit the RNG-less draw system. Rarely ever have I had to consider the opponent's actions, and decks which do are some of the weakest in the game. This pro-combo doctrine will make you less inclined to experiment with your deck since cards must be perfectly fit to be worthwhile, and most of your card packs will be recycled or spent on events. The net effect is that runs become drudgingly repetitive.

It's in early access and isn't too expensive so I don't regret buying it, but I would never recommend this over Slay the Spire in its current state. Try it only if you're a TCG/TBS junkie and have already played STS to death. | 中文翻译非常糟糕，前言不搭后语，很多关键介绍解释极为生硬已经到了无法阅读的程度，完全破坏了游戏本身，如果制作组所谓的中文文本就是这种程度，那他们所谓的诚意就是诱骗中文用户自投罗网的圈套而已。 | 我就直说了，游戏是好游戏，今天是2019年2月14日，至少目前为止中文翻译还是机翻，甚至在文本上疏忽把一个1.0写成了0.1，害的我了解规则时受到了巨大阻碍，这种不走心的中文让我在游玩游戏时受到了巨大阻碍，但这的确是一个好游戏，我不可能因此给差评，但是，今天是2019年2月14日，从今天起一直到更好的中文翻译更新之前，我不推荐语言逻辑较差的玩家或英文水平不高的玩家购入此游戏。 | 2019.2.20 스텐다드 3단계까지 깨고 작성
특징
1. 최대 3개의 카드로 구성할 수 있는 슬롯 3~5(연구소를 통해 늘릴 수 있음)개를 이용해서 적을 상대한다.
    각 슬롯마다 구성하는 카드 및 그 순서까지 정할 수 있어 적과 싸울때 운의 요소를 줄였다.
    각 슬롯의 경우 놓을 수 있는 카드 타입이 정해져있다.

2. 턴제이기는 한데 내 턴의 시간과 적 턴의 시간이 정해져 있고, 
    특정 카드를 이용하면 턴 시간을 늘리거나 줄일 수도 있으며, 심지어는 시간을 뺏을 수도 있다.

3. 카드는 내 턴에만 사용할 수 있지만, 시전시간이 있어서 발동 자체는 적 턴의 시간에 될 수도 있다.
   이를 이용하여 방어와 공격의 타이밍을 정하는 것 등 다양한 전략 플레이가 가능하다.

4. 카드 타입이 6개 정도 있는데 각각 카드 마다 특징이 명확하다. 
    빠른 공격, 체력 회복, 느리지만 강한 공격, 방어, 유틸 등 으로 구분이 된다.

5. 스텐다드 모드의 경우 5스테이지까지 존재한다,

6. 각 스테이지의 경우 1칸을 진행할 때마다 시간이 하루씩 지나가는데 지나간 시간이 길면 길수록 몬스터의 체력이 높아진다.
    시간의 경우 각 스테이지를 클리어하면 초기화된다,

7. 포탈이라는 특이한 것이 있는데 해당 스테이지에서 일정 등급 이상의 카드를 제물로 바쳐 작동시키면 
    그 스테이지에 있는 모든 포탈 근처의 곳을 이동할 수 있다.(그 스테이지 동안에는 무제한)

8. 몬스터를 잡거나 특정 이벤트를 완료할 시 카드 데이터를 주는데 모인 카드 데이터가 많을 수록 
    카드 팩을 깠을 때 더 높은 등급의 카드가 나온다. 어떤 등급의 카드들이 나올지는 카드팩을 까기 전에 알 수 있다.
    카드 팩을 까지 않을 경우 카드 데이터가 1 증가한다.
    각 스테이지의 엘리트 몬스터 뒤에 있는 이벤트가 카드 데이터 3, 스테이지 클리어 시 카드 데이터 5를 준다.
    개인적으로 보통 카드 데이터가 12~15정도가 되면 최고 등급의 카드가 2개정도 들어 있어 그 때 카드팩을 깐다.
    (이게 이득이라고 생각한다.)

9. 같은 카드라도 카드 등급이 높을 시 카드의 성능이 높아진다. 
    사용횟수가 증가하는 경우도 있고, 시전 시간이 줄어드는 경우도 있고, 공격력 등의 수치가 증가하는 경우도 있다.

10. 매 전투마다 체력이 전부 회복된 상태에서 싸우게 된다.



장점
1. 카드 풀이 굉장히 넓다. 따라서 짤 수 있는 전략도 무척 많으며 다양한 컨셉을 시도할 수 있다.

2. 카드 순서를 정할 수 있어 내가 짠 전략 그대로의 플레이가 가능하다.

3. 턴제 카드게임에 카드 시전 시간을 도입하여 참신한 카드 게임이 되었다. 
    그에 따른 새로이 경험할 수 있는 전략들도 있기에 카드 게임을 좋아하면 나쁘지 않은 선택이다.

4. 카드 타입 별로 특색이 명확하다. 또한 특이한 카드 효과들도 있어서 카드를 쓰는 재미가 쏠쏠했다. 



단점
1. 슬롯의 경우 연구소를 통해서 늘리거나 그 슬롯에 놓을 수 있는 카드 타입을 변경하거나 할 수 있는데,
    연구소에 들어가면 랜덤으로 둘 중 하나를 할 수 있다.
    1) 슬롯 증가(또는 카드 뭉치 타입 변경)
    2) 카드 1개를 제물로 바쳐 다른 카드 1개를 그 카드와 같은 등급으로 만들기
    그런데 문제는 5섹터까지 모든 연구실에 들러도 초기의 카드 뭉치 개수인 3개에서 벗어나지 못하는 경우도 있다는 것이다.
    다양한 전략을 짜기 위해서는 쓸 수 있는 카드 타입을 늘려서 덱에 새로운 특색을 주거나 
    기존 카드 타입을 1개 더 늘려 기존 컨셉을 강화해야하는데 연구소가 랜덤이어서 카드를 얻더라도 전략을 늘리지 못하고
    기존의 플레이를 반복하는 경우가 꽤나 있다. 이 때문에 같은 전략만 계속 사용하게 되어 전투가 지루해지는 경우가 꽤나 있다.

2.  이벤트가 딱히 의미있는거 같지가 않다. 내가 이벤트를 몇개 안해봐서 그런지 모르겠지만 딱히 메리트가 없다.
     이벤트의 경우 내 카드를 제물로 바쳐 진행한다. 
     그런데 최고 등급의 카드를 제물로 바쳤는데 카드 데이터 1개를 주는 경우도 있고(보상이 박하다), 최대 체력 3을 제공하는 경우도 있지만 솔직히 없어도 상관없고,
     이벤트를 진행하지 않으면 싸움이 걸리거나 시간이 더 흘러가는 것 등 손해를 끼치는 경우도 있지만 
     솔직히 카드를 제물로 바치는게 더 손해이기 때문에 또한 손해가 그렇게까지 큰 손해가 아니기 때문에 
     굳이 이벤트를 할 필요가 있나 싶다. 지금까지 하는 바로는 하지 않아도 깨는데 아무 지장도 없었다.

3. 카드 데이터를 높이기 위해 보통 스테이지에 몬스터를 전부 잡고 다음 단계로 넘어가는데 이 과정이 좀 루즈한거 같다.
    특히 연구소에서 카드 강화만 계속 나온다면 기존의 전략을 고수하는 경우가 많은데, 카드 순서까지 모두 정할 수 있는 
    이 게임의 특성상 아까 싸웠던 방식 그대로 누르기만 해도 이기는 경우가 꽤나 많다.
    이렇게 1~4스테이지 까지는 몬스터를 전부 잡고 가다가 
    5스테이지에서 포탈을 타고 보스 근처로 가서 보스를 바로 사냥하는 방식이 주를 이루는데 
    보스라고 딱히 특색이 있는건 아니어서 그냥 일반 몬스터 잡는거랑 차이를 모르겠다.


4. 카드 효과 설명이 아이콘을 사용하였지만 직관적이지 않아 어떤 효과인지 잘 모르겠는 경우도 종종 있다.






결론 : 단점을 좀 많이 쓴거 같긴 하지만 이 단점을 모두 고려하더라도 새로운 방식의 참신한 카드 게임이라고 생각한다.
          카드 자체의 종류도 다양하고 다양한 컨셉의 전략을 짤 수 있다는 점에서 이 게임을 추천한다.



2019.2.21 스텐다드 5단계까지 깨고 작성
1. 스텐다드 5단계가 되니 갑자기 새로운 이벤트들이 추가됐다.
    그러나 여전히 이벤트를 다 무시하고 해도 무난하게 클리어가 가능해서 할 필요성이 느껴지지 않았다.

2. 스텐다드 5단계가 되니 각 스테이지가 더 넓어졌다. 
    그에 따라 연구소도 늘어나서 단점으로 언급했던 카드뭉치 개수를 늘리기 힘든 문제는 해결된 것 같다. 
    전투 횟수 또한 늘어나서 원활한 카드 데이터 수급이 가능하여 카드 팩 까기의 기회가 더 많아졌다. 이에 따라 원하는 조합을 시도하기 좀 더 원활해졌다.
    카드가 남는 경우도 생기니 이때부터는 이벤트를 진행해도 괜찮을 거 같았다.
(물론 이렇다고 해도 많이 남지는 않아 기껏해야 두세개 정도의 이벤트가 가능한 정도다.)

3. 버그가 하나 있다. '점화'라는 카드 1개를 소멸시키고 그 카드의 시전 시간의 2배의 데미지를 주는 카드가 있는데 스마트키로 빠르게 시전시 가끔씩 게임이 멈춘다.
(나의 경우 2번 슬롯에 점화가 있고 1번 슬롯의 카드를 소멸시키고 싶어서 
빠르게 연달아서 w - q 를 눌렀는데 갑자기 아무 시전도 안하며 게임이 멈췄다.
항상 이러는게 아니라 몇번은 그랬다 몇번은 안그랬다 하니 좀 짜증났다.)
(천천히 카드를 선택할 경우 이 버그에 걸리지 않는다.)

4. 스텐다드 5단계까지 클리어 하였지만 여전히 보스랑 잡몹의 차이를 모르겠다.
    심지어 보스가 더 약한 경우도 있다.

5. 시작할 때 선택가능한 덱은 각각의 특색을 가지고 있지만 파워차이가 매우 심히다. | 汉字我认得，但就是连教程都看不懂游戏卡牌什么意思
Exit EA before the game is complete and abandoned. Disappointed. | Maybe just me but on easy this is F******* hard as hell, the federation gives no chill f*** this game

This game has significant potential if it were refined and free of bugs. The cheat code "greedisgood" completely disrupts gameplay. To use it, simply press enter, type the code, and repeatedly hit the ENTER key until you accumulate the desired number of crystals. Thanks to this cheat, I unlocked all achievements while still having 6 (or 8) levels left to explore. After completing the achievements, I uninstalled the game without finishing it, as I lacked the motivation to continue. This cheat is also applicable in the chicken level.

I truly appreciate the charming 3D graphics presented here. The levels are visually appealing, and the monsters are well-designed.

De longe um dos jogos com o sistema mais complexo que já joguei, não é nada amigável para novatos na franquia, tutorial é praticamente inexistente, algumas mecânicas são similares a outros jogos de mesmo gênero aí da pra levar, mas não recomendaria este aqui ser o primeiro RPG a se jogar. O jogo é complicado do início ao fim, porém a imersão é muito boa, possui um plot interessante, personagens bem escritos que participam ativamente da sua jornada. É um jogo tático baseado em RPG de mesa e sua progressão é toda feita em escolhas e rolagens de dados, e sobre as escolhas, são bem impactantes e possuam consequências reais no desenrolar da história. Elas são baseadas no sistema clássico de tendências em RPG, ou seja, além de você poder ser bom, mau ou neutro, existem escolhas mais específicas como Lawful Good, Chaotic Good, Lawful Evil, etc. quanto mais escolhas boas ou ruins você faz, isso desbloqueia diálogos com interações diferentes.

Logo de início o jogo já te pede pra criar seu personagem em uma ficha enorme de algumas páginas com muita coisa pra escolher, da pra ficar perdido ali. São dezenas de classes, as possibilidades de builds são imensas, da pra misturar classes, tem centenas de habilidades, magias e efeitos diferentes. Infinidade de itens e armas e tudo mais que se espera em um RPG deste tipo.

O combate é tempo real com pausas, porém da pra colocar em turnos e jogar de forma praticamente idêntica a jogos como Baldur's Gate 3. Sendo bem sincero o modo em tempo real é ruim, as batalhas viram uma bagunça, você precisa pausar o tempo todo senão fica difícil coordenar os personagens e aí vai tomar infinitos debuffs roubadíssimos e vai morrer sem ver nada, por isso recomendo jogar em turno mesmo. Ao longo do game existem encontros aleatórios no mapa, contra bandidos e inimigos mais fracos e repetidos, neste caso é tranquilo de fazer em tempo real pois normalmente são batalhas bem mais fáceis e rápidas.

Pathfinder Kingmaker é um jogo indie e o primeiro do estúdio, então muita coisa é mais limitada, mas algumas delas me incomodaram bastante, como por exemplo a câmera que não gira, a navegação do jogo é através de um mapa onde você escolhe um destino e entra na área, por conta disso exploração é muito fraca, estas áreas normalmente são bem pequenas. A iluminação do jogo é muito ruim, o seu personagem emana uma luz ao redor dele e todo o resto é escuro, é uma fog que é presente até durante o dia, me incomodou bastante.

Dentro do jogo tem um minigame de gerenciamento de reinos, onde você simula a evolução do seu reino, afinal um dos plots do jogo é você evoluir desde um mercenário até virar um Barão e se tornar Rei daquela região. Você cria e evolui sua cidade, conquista territórios, coloca seus companions para serem seus conselheiros e ministros e delega missões a eles, é basicamente um simulador de cidade medieval. É um sistema legal, em diversos momentos viciei legal em ficar gerenciando as cidades. Porém o time-lapse disto acelera o jogo e te força a executar algumas missões e te coloca tempo pra resolver, isso também é um pouco frustrante..

Pra finalizar, a otimização do jogo também deixa a desejar, alguns mapas tem quedas de frames, e por ser um jogo que não tão recente deveria rodar bem melhor, mas não chega a atrapalhar a experiência. 

É um game extremamente complexo, mas pra quem busca uma aventura que simule a experiência de se jogar um RPG de mesa tá aí uma opção bem fiel. | I wish this game wasn't impossible to play with non-perfect builds on normal mode. Really wanted to like it but the encounters are FUCKED | If you have played the tabletop, dive in and enjoy. If not, know there is a lot to learn and its not friendly to those who don't know at least some of the game's setting, weapons, feats, or magic types. | 好玩又耐玩的游戏。

Man, I love this damn game. I haven't installed any mods yet, but I plan to once I get through my backlog. You get a great feel for the BT universe, even if things are hokey, cliche, silly, or weird. That's BT, baby!

Improvements: Autocannons are now useful and damage is more balanced. Stability is a fun mechanic and helps with the big boys. AC/2s are actually interesting! The game is quick, and running a melee-build Grasshopper is always hella fun. The initiative system is fine for getting things moving, and the pilot specializations are mostly good, though some are clear superior standouts (like less damage, better initiative, and heat-dumping).

Neutral things: Lance size, map size, visibility, and scouting are all made for the game... which means they often are small or not nearly to the scale people hoped for. Long range weapons are usually only good for their other benefits (headcappers, stability) because visibility is short. Maps are repetitive, as are missions, though there's only so many ways you can generate mission types on a game like this. The Argo is pure protagonist magic, as is the DropShip-to-DropShip rule-breaking FLT, but that was a way to keep lance sizes to 4 'mechs. Reinforcements always show up in a prescribed location to be in the way, which is sometimes ridiculous (8 assault mechs pounding one of yours into scrap always feels arbitrary when they just showed up and zoomed into the initiative).

Bad things: The generated pilot pictures, including your character, look like ass. The Kickstarter and backer ones are much better. There's no true mercenary campaign mode with a Union or something; you can always haul as much gear, mechs, and parts as you want, even on the Leopard. The game pushes you to heavier and heavier mechs through the campaign and the post-campaign missions; the Flashpoints are much better, but you often need the money from the heavy missions to fund that scrap heap of a DropShip. ComStar would have blown the Argo out of the sky as soon as you got it up, let alone when you start finding Clan Wolverine things. Some mechs are clearly superior (all the ones from Heavy Metal), so you use those much more. Why use a Catapult when an Archer lobs missiles better? Why touch a scout mech when you can drive an Assassin and be untouchable?

All in all, an awesome, fun game. I hope Battletech 2, if it ever happens, puts you in the Chaos March as a true mercenary, similar to MechCommander 2 or some of the MechWarrior 5 Mercenary stuff. That would truly be baller. | This game is good fun! I especially enjoy the Battletech Advanced and Roguetech mods, although the game engine struggles to run them well. | Не зашла. Пробовал начинать раза четыре. Не идет. Не затягивает. Вроде как задумка не плохая. Но чего то в ней не хватает. Возможно попытки с десятой, если бы разобрался бы во всем. Simplesmente o melhor tower defense já inventado, segue sendo atualizado e recebendo carinho dos desenvolvedores, mesmo depois de anos de seu lançamento, e a comunidade é sensacional, recomendo sempre! | This game is starting to become micro-transaction hell. It's true that they have given us numerous free updates, and with those updates we were given new towers, heroes, maps, and maybe more I don't know about. But at the same time, we are starting to get charged for what should be basic game play features or even QoL additions. The new map editor luckily lets you grind in game for it, but for new players you have to either choose a map editor you could have fun with or a hero that could help with game play. It doesn't help that both the map editor and heroes cost monkey money, which is a purchasable currency. But then there are the other examples like three times fast mode(To speed up tracks an extra tier) and even something as simple as a double cash mode. Which from what I understand only doubles in map currency, not even monkey money. The double cash mode costs $18, the triple speed mode costs $7, the game costs $14. This is not acceptable even with the amount of free content. 

Even the stuff we can get without purchasable currency is a weird daily/weekly grind. I'm talking about the trophy shop. I wish I could just grind a bunch of different options in a day, but from my experience you can only grind timed challenges that rotate and give you a reward once. This feels like a very unnecessary limit as it hinders cosmetic process for no reason. 

And now with their newest DLS, Rouge Legends. This is $10, so even double cash mode is worth more than this. But besides that, this DLC offers a new rule set, a new explore-able map(You get to explore it, not play on it), and it gives you unlock-able rouge like artifacts that change how you play the game. No new tower, no new hero, no new playable map. The fact they charge $10 for a new rule set and artifacts is ridiculous. 

It's starting to feel like they are attaching high dollar amounts to any little thing. I even had the option to purchase the new tower that came out a bit ago. But it feels like there is a cult around this game, justifying them putting high price tags on small things. Calling you stupid for even questioning price, pointing to the free things they have given us. I enjoyed this game and it is fun, and I highly appreciate the free updates, but there are so many micro transactions or a BIG amount of grind. I'd rather pay for content at a reasonable price than get free updates but seemingly random features get held until you pay more than they are worth, on top of the option to pay for just about anything in the game(New towers, more monkey money for heroes and more, random modifiers like money and speed, and even Monkey Knowledge). Not to mention, having to pay(or grind a lot) for the map editor and then having to pay even more for extra props. If then micro transactions can go down and become more fair, then I highly recommend this game. But as far as I see, it's only going to get worse. I'd recommend for new players to stay away unless they want to grind a lot or pay even more money. | The greatest tower defense game ever. Has many mechanics. Three paths available for each monkey, You need to use the monkey a lot to get it's xp and to unlock the upgrades for the monkey. Has many maps and game modes, too. Bloons TD 6 offers everything you're looking for in a Tower Defense game | I only bought this game spontaneously when it was on a ridiculous discount. As of today, I paid approximately 1/4 of a cent per hour of playtime. It's ridiculously addictive, but in a relatively healthy way. Highly recommended for anyone who likes tower defense. | O jogo realmente é muito bom e vale a pena gastar 28 conto nele, porém a nova "dlc" roguelite está estupidamente caro, sendo quase duas vezes mais caro do que o jogo base!

Steel Circus is a competitive 3v3 game comparable to Rocket League but with heroes and skills.

The gameplay is easy to learn but hard to master. You will curse a lot when you get crushed by your opponents and bath in their tears when you are winning.

There are no lootboxes or gameplay affecting items to buy for real money. 

It's a fun game with a really nice community and responsive developers.

pd: jade te amo | Es un buen juego pero lo compre esperando que alguien quisiera jugar conmigo y en lugar de eso hasta espante a mi novia, en conclusion es bueno pero seria mejor si a Scorpion se le viera el pi | Critical Issues with MK Matches:

While the core gameplay of Mortal Kombat (MK) is solid and enjoyable, the overall experience is significantly hampered by technical and balancing issues. Approximately 90% of my match sessions are abruptly terminated due to desynchronization errors, making it nearly impossible to complete a game. This persists despite running the game on a fully updated system with Windows 11 and the latest drivers.

Furthermore, character balancing remains a major concern. Certain characters feel overwhelmingly "pay-to-win," as they can spam a single move and secure victory within a few hits. Health imbalance is another glaring issue, where your attacks deal significantly reduced damage compared to your opponent’s, and their hits often register first—even if you initiate the attack. This leads to frustrating situations where the opponent’s animations override yours, suggesting possible script manipulation or unfair mechanics designed to prolong playtime.

On top of this, Mortal Kombat’s constant desynchronization problems make the game incredibly frustrating. Matches frequently end mid-session, and while this might be tolerable at first, it becomes unbearable when it happens in 100% of matches on certain days. For a premium game on PC or console, this level of instability is unacceptable and detracts from the enjoyment.

In comparison, a free mobile game like Shadow Fight 4 Arena offers a far smoother and more reliable experience, with no such issues. Considering MK's technical flaws, it’s hard to recommend the game, especially when its most basic functionality—completing a match—is unreliable.

If these issues are widespread across the entire MK franchise, it raises serious questions about the developers’ commitment to quality. Rather than frustrating players with a broken experience, it may be time for the developers to reassess their approach—or even consider retiring the series until these problems are resolved. | Very good i really like mortal kombat but it seems i cant do online mode. that is sucks considering i want to try it out but still a good game with your friends doing local multiplayer just buy it when its on sale tho. | Jade favori karakterim ve Scorpion'a sayısız kez yenilmeme rağmen, bir türlü yenilmelere doyamadım.

I am coming back to give this game a review after sinking thousands of hours over into both Civ 4 and Civ 5 and on the launch day of Civ 7. Having played Civ 7 for a few hours now, I can say that that those of us who truly loved and still love Civ 5 judged Civ 6 too harshly when it released. It changed some things that people liked, but I still found many of its new features truly enjoyable on launch. I had fun. I still preferred 5, but in 6 the art, the music, the innovations to unrest, espionage, religion, and--to a lesser extent--city development were all excellent. Heroes are cool. The roster is cool. Civ 7 has little that is as redeeming in it at launch and I wholeheartedly recommend 6 instead. | Great game and recommended if you are a strategy player. З негативного на мій погляд - викривлення певних історичних контекстів. Простежується культурна апропріація. 
Як наприклад Києво-Печерська Лавра - серце України в реальності,  є особливою спорудою російської імперії у грі... Як зокрема і унікальний юніт - козаки, що у реальності початково виникли як соціальний клас саме у степах України.
 Дуже нериємно це бачити, особливо в умовах, коли росія щодня знищує наші міста в реальності...

 | Нові стратегічні рішення та чудова графіка.
Але важко уявити, що в 2025 році ми все ще змушені бачити у світі ігор проросійські наративи. У новій версії гри розробники "відзначилися" черговим ігноруванням української локалізації та повного ігнорування української нації, яка переживає героїчну боротьбу за своє існування та незалежність.  

Анонс нового персонажа, цариці-душогубки, яка нав'язується як "символ культури та просвітництва", виглядає як зневага до мільйонів українців. Героізація імперіалістичної постаті — це не тільки обурливо, але й аморально в контексті війни та окупації, яку сьогодні переживає наша країна.  

Українці заслуговують на повагу в індустрії відеоігор, а не на спроби просувати імперський наратив під виглядом "культурних цінностей". Досить толерувати пропаганду! Вимагаємо повноцінної української локалізації, українських героїв і персонажів, які реально відображають нашу історію, культуру та боротьбу.

It's hard to believe that in 2025 we are still witnessing pro-Russian narratives in the gaming industry. In the latest version of the game, the developers once again ignored Ukrainian localization and completely erased the Ukrainian nation, which is heroically fighting for its survival and independence.  

The announcement of a new character, a tsarina-murderer being portrayed as a "symbol of culture and enlightenment," is a slap in the face to millions of Ukrainians. Glorifying an imperialist figure is not only outrageous but also immoral in the context of the war and occupation Ukraine is enduring today.  

Ukrainians deserve respect in the gaming industry, not an attempt to promote imperial narratives disguised as "cultural values." Enough with the propaganda! We demand full Ukrainian localization, Ukrainian heroes, and characters that truly reflect our history, culture, and struggle. | 非常杀时间的游戏，经常一开始玩就忘记时间了，看着文明不停地发展，心里也会有种成就感，只是这个画风有点卡通了，要是能够写实点就好了😁😁😁

Guardian Quest привлекает добротным артом, интересной боевкой, где мы заранее полностью видим ход врага, есть активное перемещение по рядам и линям. 10 героев у каждого 3 пути, 5 актов, несколько режимов игры, куча шмоток разных уровней редкости и тиров, крафт, руны. Казалось бы, контента на сотни часов, чего тебе еще надо?

Гейм-дизайна, мне очень надо гейм-дизайна и немного UI.

Играл на максимальной сложности, за 30+ часов дошел до второго акта. Бесконечные битвы начинают утомлять, а тут как на зло квест: проведи еще 8 боев с элитными врагами. Спустись в данж, а там за каждый ключ снова эти рутинные бои, и снова, и снова. Там уже нет никакой сложности, но врагов много, десятки. Каждый ход на каждого нужно навестись, чтобы посмотреть кого они там бьют, с линии на линию всех переместить, это все затягивается, а потом снова такой же бой, и снова, и снова. 
Уже собрана и прогрейжена кор дека, ты редко берешь новые карты или не делаешь этого вовсе, а подавляющие кол-во вещей- мусор.

Из-за неудобного интерфейса, возня с картами, рунами, перековкой, расходниками, артефактами, древом прокачки затягивается буквально на часы. Это просто пытка. Этого всего слишком много, ты в этом просто тонешь.

Казалось бы, 10 героев должны внести разнообразие, но ты не будешь их менять ведь под них уже нароллены карты и собраны артефакты.

И вроде хочется играть, но, когда ты в самой игре, в очередном бою тягомотишь это и в награду очередной раз получаешь хлам и 20 золотых, а потом смотришь сколько тебе их еще надо до финала и просто опускаются руки. | 游戏缝的还凑合，也有自己的特点，但能感受出在开发过程中，早期的一些设定和最终的成品完全不匹配。比如回血和回疲劳第二章开始做到了一起；中期以后的扎营完全变成负面作用，导致补给完全没用处。等等…
游戏还有一个致命的缺点，打到后期完全没有爽点。如果全体爆输出，不管对手啥怪，都是开局一轮秒；如果战法牧打法，每一轮打怪都要一个个看每个怪的攻击目标，时间拖得久太折磨了…；自由度过于高，那么多职业那么多卡牌，研究联动也非常非常拖节奏。
但是至少前10个小时还是玩的非常有意思的，折扣价入手不亏。 | 游戏很不错，自由度高，适合休闲玩家，看我游戏时间。
而且我看见开发者团队有在认真回复每一个玩家的评论，我觉得这样的游戏怎么都不会太差。 | 優秀的卡牌+RPG養成遊戲
獨特裝備提升強 但獲取和強化的隨機性太高 成本高但刷了半天不一定有自己想要的
 | Easy to play, difficult to master.

Absolutely worth spending a some time on this little gem, particularly in earlier levels before you settle on your preferred team offers plenty of variety and interest. After a while it can become a little goldfishy after the main campaign but there is a certain appeal in that. You can min-max to your heart's content and enjoy making the perfect team.

Genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, RPG, Strategy
Reviews:
An interesting rogue-like deck battler game with a solid mechanic, great number of build variety for the 3 characters that are present in the game and some interesting ideas that differentiated it from other card battlers.

Thats why its such a shame that the story is so barebone (since the game kind of built up some sort of story with the opening cinematic and did not develop it any further than that) and the available modes are not that interesting.

Still, it is a solid card game thats worth a try.

難度很高，物品非常不平衡，但是營造出的氛圍跟遊戲上癮程度卻出奇的好 | Easy to learn, addicting to play. Plenty of fun items to try new strategies and synergies with. Not hard if you cheese it but can be nice and challenging if you try to play with a little more finesse. I love the daily dungeons with unique rules and there are frequent updates that have kept the game fresh. The attack sound is also so satisfying to hear, really quality stuff. Definitely recommend checking it out if you love stats on cards. | Fantastic and unique roguelike. Hard as nails but worth putting a lot of time into. Big fan of the huge number of equipment slots and potential combos. I downloaded this first on game pass to try it and loved it. Bought it on switch after it left game pass, and then got if for steam when I got a steam deck. Literally 3 play throughs from scratch and never got sick of it at all....(Although I never had the patience to go after more of the hard achievements again on steam lol).

Definitely a no brainer purchase. If this game looks interesting to you at all then it's a must buy. | honestly i love this game i dont always have wifi and besides mtg this is one of y most goto games when my internet is out its just hard enough to be fun and just fun enough to stay installed forever on my laptop. all and all 10/10 game | 面白くて難易度ハードクリアまでプレイ。
死ぬ時は開始1~2分で死ぬのが、テンポが良くて潔し。
操作は非常にシンプル。
爆発に巻き込まれないようにするのだけは注意して。
不思議なダンジョンに近いプレイ感だった。

Genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Free To Play
Reviews: ИГРА ПРОСТО ОГОНЬ!

Not impressed. A lot of towers have similar mechanics,you could've just made it neutral and let player chose element afterwards. Monsters don't have new mechanics whatsoever. By amount of different towers one could assume there will be a lot of different strategies. Nope,just build and you're good. | I've played this game some years ago and decided to play again for some nostalgia feeling. This game is balanced and fun. The campaign is great. I like the feature to adjust the game speed and the tower effects does not pollute what is happening. The only downside of this game is that few people play it on multiplayer, but they added a system that alert you when someone create a multiplayer room. This game worth a try, it is a solid tower defense. | I first played EleTD back in the heyday of War3 custom maps, and it was one of my favorite TD maps, and one of the few where I didn't get turned off by the competitive mode. This is a faithful recreation of that map, but with a campaign that hooked me, and an even larger selection of tower choices. Looks and feels very polished, and the gameplay and balance are tight. The campaign was challenging without being punishing. | Чомусь від цієй простенької гри ноут починає розганятись до швидкості світла зі звуками взльоту винищувача.

А так то крута гра для релаксу) | игра годная взял по скидке есть анекдоты и сами уровни интересные и разнообразные, один из лучших тавер дефенсов в которые я пока играл, мне всё нравится =] определённо стоит своих денег

Genres: Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
Reviews:
It's fun. A simpler, easier Rimworld. But honestly, it's a bit TOO easy. Especially as you can build in 3D, allowing you to manipulate terrain to force attackers into a killbox. The 3D aspect is also a positive, for settlement building etc. So ups and downs. Literally. | Decided to give this game a go after it has been in my bought games list for some time now. Boght it a while back since it reminded me a mix of the games RimWold + Timber And Stone. 
My goodness, it feels a good game for an Alpha phase. Think i only had like two crashes in the 90 in-game hours.

I played an easy game but the first winter was still challenging. After i learned some tricks, built some shacks and an underground kitchen and leveled up my tech, it started to go uphill. There is always something to do in the game. Next thing you know the sun starts to come up irl outside :/
After watching TactiCat youtube video, i decided to build my own moat and a gatehouse castle with the portcullis and all. After arming my men with heavy crossbows no enemies have reached inside! Easy battles - maybe even too easy.

In the future, i hope the battle mechanics keeps getting better. For example they should attack together or in different sides. Currently they trickle in one by one and they also get shot one by one. I was afraid they would build their own brides over the ditches or bring ladders to climb my walls - or even dig through them... But no, they just pick the easiest route - meaning the one that is full of traps and leads them to a killbox that is guarded by crossbows on three sides.
Also would love to see some additions such as ledgers to farming plots to mark when to start sowing and cutting, or to be able to set production levels while selecting multiple production stations (icebox and brick-maker comes to mind). Maybe nerf apple tree production a bit.

Overall, a game with very high potential that is playable in its alfa state. Hope it gets more additions in the future. | 살짝 모지라고 하자있는 정착민으로 중세의 마을(왕성까지 가능)을 만들어보는 게임.

농사시키면 작물을 베도 수확물인 씨앗과 채소를 저장소로 옮기지 않는다!

사냥시키면 활로 동물을 쏴죽이고 그냥 온다! 시체를 가져와야 고기든 가죽이든 벗겨서 써먹을거 아니냐!

또는 지가 잠 잘시간에 시키지도 않은 뻘짓하느라 피곤한거면서, 그걸로 잠 제대로 못잤다고 짜증내면서 마을을 떠나는 경우도 잇습니다!
(이럴땐 오후 1시부터2시까지 의무 낮잠 시간을 설정해주면 보통 해결됩니다. 나도 못하는 걸 얘들이 하고 있네)

그래도 우리 정착민들...하나하나 찝어서 일 시키면 잘해요. 보이지 않는 곳에선 놀고있을지도 모르겠지만요.

술처먹고 뻗어있는 경우도 많구요. 으이구 화상들...

샌드박스 게임이라 그런지, 제공해주는 건축물 샘플 없음!

스타크래프트나 워크래프트 처럼 단축키 누르고 건설장소 클릭한다고 건물이 뚝딱 완성되지 않음!

일일이 바닥만들고 기둥세우고 벽세우고 창문 만들고 문만들고 책상 넣어주고 의자 넣어주고 침대 넣어주고, 추우면 화로도 놔주고, 미관이 별로여서 정착민이 짜증내면 양탄자도 깔아주고, 조각상도 넣어주고, 거울도 넣어주고... 작업실이 부족하면 작업공간도일일이 맹글어주고...

그러다보니 게이머에게도 심시티를 위한 기본적인 설계능력과 창의력을 요구합니다.

튜토리얼 매우 불친절하구요. 딱 기본적인 기능의 지식만 제공합니다.

세부적인 기능이 자잘하게 정말 많은데, 친절하게 일일이 설명해주진 않아요.
(그놈의 방나누기 기능)
      
건물 짓는게임 좋아하시는 분에겐 정말 좋을것 같네요.

난이도는 보통기준으로 그렇게 어려운편은 아니나, 침략자가 한번 처들어와서 정착민을 한명이라도 죽이는 순간 난리가 납니다.

애들이 슬퍼서 술만 처먹고 일을 안해요. 그러면 소는 누가키우나요 소는.

가축도 굶어죽고 먹을게 사라지니 정착민도 굶어죽는 해피 엔딩이 찾아올수도 있으니, 망루도 짓고, 성벽도 짓고, 함정도 열시히 깔고, 테라포밍하면서 적이 쉽게 처들어 오지 못하도록 지형도 바꾸고... 많은 노력과 시간을 필요로합니다.

심지어 이 정착민들은 단체로 성별이 없거나 중성화를 했거나, 정관을 묶은 녀석들이라 붕가붕가도 못하고 아기도 못 낳습니다.

어이구 무슨 낙으로 사나...

아무튼 그래서 정착민의 숫자를 늘리기 위해선, 어디 머나먼 타국에서 노예였던 녀석들이 우리마을로 탈출해와서 정착민이 되는 경우가 가장 많고요.

근데 이놈들이 도망쳐 올거면 제대로 도망치던지 아주 꼬리(추적자)까지 줄줄 달고 오는 바람에 전쟁도 심심치 않게 발생한답니다.

전투 난이도가 어렵진 않은 편이나, 한놈만 뒈져도 그놈의 감정(기분)시스템 덕분에 애들이 단체로 술처먹고 일을 안하므로 세심한 컨트롤로 단 한명도 죽지 않게끔 컨트롤 해줘야합니다.

그리고 이 추격자 놈들 노예 몸값으로 소 12마리 또는 염소 25~30마리정도를 원하더군요.

아니 이 양아치 새퀴덜... 고작 노예 하나인데 소 12마리...? 무슨 타국의 왕자정도 되는 인물이 탈출한건 줄 알았습니다.

이 세계관에서 소 12마리는 나라 한개 정도는 거뜬히 세울만한 값어치란 말입니다...!

열받으니까 그냥 협상하지말고 전부 대가리 깨버리세요. 

무슨 일도 잘 못하는 잡놈 하나에 소 12마리야.

크흠... 아앗 급발진을...

아무튼 재밌습니다.

건축 덕후들에게 적극 추천합니다.

한 30% 할인 했을 때 사세요., | Picked it up a year or so ago.  Played an hour or two.  Decided it needed more time in the oven.
Saw the latest update and thought I'd give it another try...  I'll let my hours played tell you more.
Performance issues abound.  Has lots of wonk.  Don't expect Rimworld or Dwarf Fortress.  I hope the Dev's can continue to build on its strong foundation. | First, I want to say that I love the game and have already logged many hours of gameplay :) I’ve been playing it since shortly after the release, I believe.

However, I have a few suggestions for the development team that could make the game even more fun:

Please, please remove the developer window!!! (Red text in a box that has to be manually closed repeatedly). This disrupts the flow of the game a lot.

Caravans:

Allow caravans to travel from settlement to settlement, not just from settlement to your main settlement.
Allow players to preview which goods are tradeable with the desired settlement to avoid carrying unnecessary items.
Allow setting up and saving permanent caravans. This would save time and effort, especially when you need certain goods repeatedly (ores, etc.).
Gameplay:

Allow raiding other settlements. Arm settlers and send them on a mission to raid, then loot and dismantle enemy bases after the raid.
Crafting:

Make it possible to select certain items to dismantle. For example, almost broken clothes, etc., instead of just a general option. A possible flow could be: send a settler to a broken helmet, select "dismantle," and then take the item to the workbench to break it down.
I will continue playing the game even if it stays exactly as it is now! These are just ideas that could optimize the gameplay and add even more fun.

Over time, I also have more ideas that I’d be happy to share.

Great work so far to the development team! Thank you for the amazing game that still has so much more potential <3

Хорошая игра. Скоротать вечерок для ценителей вселенной, очень приятно. Донат не влияет если играть в удовольствие. Максимум можно закинуть на одну колоду. Но со старта можно спокойно играть в события, там готовые колоды. Естественно если вы хотите всех нагибать СРАЗУ и в топе где играют уже около года и более , будьте добры собрать колоды полные легендарок путем вливания в контейнеры большого количества реала.
Если не спешит а играть в удовольствие донат не нужен. | Pay to win rubbish, and always has been. A few years ago even I put money into this mess...and more often than not some irrit who just happened to spend more money had cards that were massively OP> Way to go Everguild in following GW's example of screwing over their players | Not gonna lie this game isn't perfect, but I'm still enjoying it.  If you like other card games online and you like 40k, give this a try. | its a fun free to play card game to play at work on phone or just to pass the time | love love love this game.

如果你是萌新，请听完以下反问，内容再考虑是否购买

1，目前服务器经常被攻击，攻击之后导致整个服务器卡顿，我最近玩了21场，16场游戏被攻击，毫无游戏体验，你能否接受？
2，恶意踢人经常发生，有的欺负新人，有的和你意见不合就整你，以上都是发生在萌新服务器，这样你能否接受？
3，游戏非常硬核，我完了180小时，勉强算是能当队长知道干啥，能知道敌人从哪个地方打过来，需要大量的时间学习这款游戏，你能否接受？
4，你的队友，甚至指挥官都是呆萌的萌新，一直会输掉战斗，且正常战斗你也不知道要干嘛，莫名其妙就输了，会持续很长一段时间这样的状态，你能否接受？
5，不要被一些人误导，看到他们的战术如何牛，如何逆转败局，这个游戏顺风碾压是家常便饭，你看到的是一些视频制作者为数不多的逆风翻盘局拿来给你装X的，会比你看到的视频有很大的误差，你能否接受？

如果以上你都能接受，完全可以买。如果有2点或2点以上接受不了，建议不要购买本游戏。 | un brasileño, un argentino, un chileno y un peruano en un mismo team que busca ganar la guerra contra los alemanes.

This game rules, The best Banished-like city builder, I would argue even better than Banished itself (which is also amazing and genre-defining).

The devs are only adding more and more content, each improving to the game and adding more challenges. | After nearly 20 hours of playing in the last few days, I think it's safe to say I like this game.

Not because it's a colony sim. I've played my fair share of citybuilders and logistics management games and, while Timberborn does a perfectly competent job at that, it isn't what makes the game truly special (at least not for me).

Because what do beavers do? They build dams. So what would super-intelligent beavers in a post-apocalyptic future do? Why, they'd build massive water engineering projects, of course.

That, for me, is the main selling point of the game and what really sets it apart from similar colony builders: your survival depends on managing water, which means building dams and floodgates and levees and sluices  to direct and control its flow. You use water to keep your farmland irrigated, keep your drinking tanks filled, and to power your industry. Water is your lifeblood, it is your everything - so manage it well.

Oh - and just to check, you've got an alternate flow solution for the upcoming Badtide, right? Don't get *too* comfortable just cuz you got your irrigation sorted out.

Timberborn lives on its beautiful modelling of water flow, so much so that it made me read up on fluid dynamics to really understand the nitty gritty of how water speed, volume and pressure all interact with each other. If you want to play a game that indirectly teaches you how Bernoulli's principle works, get Timberborn. (I'll just add that to the list of 'sentences I never thought I'd type'.) | I had to uninstall this game. I don't even play city builders! Why am I putting so much time and energy into this game!?

If you want a time sync play this game. It's a delightful way to spend your time and it's pretty low stakes. Just make sure you follow the tutorial steps early because I've found the most likely point for your colony to die is very early. Once it's up and running you might screw it up and kill off half your beavers but it's kinda difficult to kill off so many that the colony entirely collapses.

Oh, and prioritize simple foods and water above all other jobs. So long as your colonists have those they survive. They might not be happy but grumpy and alive is better than dead.

Anyway, play it. Good game. 8/10. Now I'm going to uninstall it before I lose another two working weeks of my life to it. | 　取り敢えずプレイ時間1,600ちょい、ワンダー発動１回ほどしか遊んでいないニワカプレイヤーの戯言です。

　ビーバーが植林したり森林を伐採して、ダムを造り、飲料水を確保し、水車や畑（農作業小屋など）を造ったり、収穫した作物を加工して食料を造ったりして村を経営。備蓄した資源の量を見てニヤニヤするのんびり作業ゲームです。
　ビーバーの種族とマップを決定後、ゲームプレイを始める前の最初の初期設定（特に汚水期間の有無）次第でヌルゲーモードにしたり、即ゲームオーバーになる難易度にできたりします。
　科学研究をすることにより、より大きな倉庫やタンクなど、新たな建設物が解放されるゲームシステムですが、個人的にはダイナマイトが開発されると一気に地形的自由度が増して楽しめています。掘った土砂で穴を埋めたり崖を盛って整地するのもアリです。
　敵は出てきません。自然環境が敵とも言えますが。選んだ種族とは違うもう一方の種族が襲ってくるようなこともありません。むしろ出てこないで（笑）
　いろんなマップがありますが全部クリアを目指すか、お気に入りマップだけ延々とプレイするかはプレイヤー次第。
　ワンダー目当てで１マップ本気でクリア（？）しようとすると結構な時間が掛かります。下手な超大作RPGよりべらぼうに掛かります（笑）
　私は途中で放りだして他のマップをやったり最初からやり直したりする軟弱なプレイヤーですが、結局、気がついたらsteamの中で一番長く遊んでいるゲームです。
　乾季の設定を長くして精神鍛錬的な殺伐なゲームプレイをするも良し。自分で適度な難易度を設定して、争いごと無しにのんびりダラダラ建設する系のSLGが好きな方にお勧めです。 | 总体好评，每个档前10-20个周期都是很有趣的。但是迫切需要解决后期缺乏目标的问题！在我将所有的水源纳入控制、将所有土地改造得适合耕种和生产、用机器人取代了血肉之躯。那么接下来呢？
1. 我已经准备好面对更多种类、更加艰苦的自然灾害了。
2. 我将以这片地区为基地，在成熟的基地作为后支援的情况下，征服和改造更广大的区域。
我认为这两个方向是很适合Timberborn的游戏节奏的。
当然，或许制作组作为专业的游戏行业从业者会有更好的电子解决后期无聊的问题，但是从目前的U7预览里，似乎没有看到往这个方向上的努力。
不过，如果制作组能解决经营建造类游戏不想开下一把的世界性难题的话就另说了

F1 2020 traz o melhor do automobilismo para computador PC


F1 2020 já chegou ostentando uma marca histórica bem inusitada. Com o mundo todo parado em uma crise de saúde sem precedentes, coube ao simulador da Codemasters mostrar como a temporada completa poderia ter se desenrolado em um mundo normal, livre da pandemia do coronavírus.



Crie sua própria escuderia:

A grande estrela da edição deste ano é o novo modo Minha Equipe, no qual você pode montar a sua própria construtora do zero. Coisa rara na história da categoria, aqui você é tanto o dono do time como o seu principal piloto, então pense nisso como uma versão mais tunada do modo carreira.

Ainda dá para jogar só como piloto no carreira, que continua existindo em uma estrutura bem similar aos jogos anteriores da franquia, mas é difícil encontrar motivos para fazer isso quando o novo modo é tão mais divertido e repleto de recursos.

Logo que você começa a jogar o Minha Equipe, pode escolher as fabricantes de peças do seu carro, criar seu emblema, mudar as cores do veículo e optar entre diferentes patrocinadores e metas de temporada. Com a grana que sobra, você precisa contratar um segundo piloto que, a princípio, será bem barato e desconhecido.

O legal aqui é que você precisa fazer a sua equipe ganhar fama com bons resultados antes de poder persuadir os maiores nomes do automobilismo a correr no seu time. Entre cada corrida você pode investir em melhorias para o seu carro e arrumar a agenda de atividades escolhendo quais alternativas trazem mais dinheiro ou notoriedade, como participar de peças de publicidade ou treinos abertos.

Em todos os modos você pode customizar a duração da temporada e das corridas como bem entender, criando a experiência que melhor se encaixa com o seu calendário. Em cada GP você pode correr o final de semana completo, com três treinos livres, classificação e então corrida, ou então partir direto para o vamos ver.


Boa variedade e licenças:

Outra adição muito bem-vinda é o modo de tela dividida, que permite participar das corridas ao lado de um amigo ou familiar. É curioso pensar que esse modo era regra lá na geração 16 bits, mas depois foi perdendo espaço conforme os jogos ganharam complexidade.

Ainda bem que ele voltou, pois é uma ótima forma de passar tempo e se divertir, e faz bastante diferença para justificar a compra de F1 2020. Uma linha horizontal divide a tela em duas metades e, surpreendentemente, mesmo na versão básica do PS4, na qual testamos o jogo, ele conseguiu manter uma estável taxa de quadros por segundo, sem maiores engasgadas ou percalços técnicos!!!


Vale a Pena ? Com Certeza Absoluta

F1 2020 é mais um excelente capítulo da franquia anual da Codemasters, e o melhor simulador do gênero no mercado. Apesar de seus gráficos e controles serem muito similares aos seus predecessores, a adição de um modo em tela dividida e, especialmente, do divertido modo Minha Equipe, ajudam a justificar a compra de mais uma atualização de carros e pilotos. Fãs da série vão se divertir como nunca, e novatos vão encontrar o simulador mais completo possível.


Pros:

* Novo modo em tela dividida diverte
* Dificuldade ajustável para todos os níveis
* Apresentação fiel à televisão
* Modo Minha Equipe foi uma excelente adição
* Totalmente localizado em português ( Maravilhoso isso é )


Contras:

* Gameplay similar demais ao jogo anterior

I really enjoy the VAs here, I need to look them up at some point, esp the VA for the main villain, Xolas.
Otherwise the game has this kinda "Alice In Wonderland" style and I like the art.

The problem is, and why I cannot recommend it, the battle system.
I put the game on Casual and by Chapter 15 the game gets so hard ON REGULAR ENEMIES that I can't really survive and the enemies will also take turns out of turn, which makes it impossible to heal a dying character.
If this game didn't have a "wave" combat system, it'd be so much better and I wouldn't have to pray to Cthulhu to try and actually finish a damn battle.

Outside of that, the worse aspect about the game is you need a touchscreen to do the combos effectively; not engaging in effective combos makes you miss hits because of the "Epic attacks" system which is absolutely god awful. I actually bought this game back when I had a touchscreen laptop but I moved up to buying a 240hz monitor and built my own PC around that spec, so I don't have touchscreen anymore which puts me at a huge disadvantage with this game now. It's not easy at all to play this with a mouse. | OSU rpg, pretty fun actually.

[b] "Kingdom Come: Deliverance" - игра с очень непростой судьбой, которую на своих зубах вытащил мой любимый Дэниэль Вавра, покинувший 2k со своей небольшой командой. Поначалу всё было настолько плохо, что ребята даже не могли найти инвесторов и пришлось запускать сбор средств на Kickstarter, в связи с чем к проекту было приковано даже больше внимания, чем разработчики планировали изначально. 
После сбора внушительной суммы нашёлся даже издатель и началась работа, в ходе которой Вавра и остальные настолько желали создать максимально исторически точный проект, что сами ездили на места, с которых рисовали локации, примеряли доспехи тех лет, махали мечами, булавами и серьёзно консультировались с историками и экспертами по той эпохе, дабы сделать всё максимально правильно. 
И вот разработка шла - шла, а в 2018 игра увидела свет.. И о, боже, как её хоронили на старте немалое количество журналистов и даже игроков, а всё из - за нереально отбитого технического состояния. Ситуация была ничем не лучше релиза Киберпанка или любой другой ожидаемой игры, которую похоронила данная проблема. Также был очень резонансный скандал с Американской прессой, которая как всегда начала обвинять игру в расизме, ведь в Богемии 1403 года внезапно не было Афроамериканцев, а Вавра должен был это исправить. Правда, базированный мужик лаконично послал всех в пешее эротическое, чем заработал ещё долю геймерского уважения.[/b]

[h1]Если враг оказался многочисленнее, лучше сбежать — выжить, чтобы позже победить.[/h1]

Лично же я в 2018 игру благородно пропустил, ибо куда мне было тогда соваться с моей 1050Ti на борту, а у большинства по железу была ситуация далеко не лучше. Игра была невероятно требовательной, да даже сейчас она не может выдавать в городе стабильные 60 фпс на 4070Ti (что по сути и до сих пор является главной проблемой) и к этим завышенным системкам прибавлялись ещё сотни багов, софтлоки и куча - куча других проблем. Тут же появляется вопрос. А за что же тогда ухватились игроки 6 лет назад, позволив игре полноценно расправить свои крылья, выпустив миллион патчей и фиксов, а также 5 ДЛС? А всё просто..... 

[h1]Надо же было узнать, скован ли ты бессмысленными принципами или думаешь своей головой.[/h1]

"Kingdom Come" - игра, которую вы либо полюбите всем сердцем, либо бросите спустя 3 часа и дело тут не в техническом состоянии (оно всё - таки по большей части уже исправлено, кроме оптимизации). С самого начала на тебя наваливается столько всего, что возникает ощущение, будто ты пришёл на новую работу, а тебе тут же одному всучили обязанности 6 человек. Если вы остались на этой работе, то потом внезапно оказывается, что и обязанности то не такие тяжёлые и надбавочка то за каждое есть, да и коллектив отличный, ну а если ушли, то тоже никто осуждать не будет, ведь такое далеко не для всех и даже я первые 2 - 3 часа всерьёз думал о том, чтобы сменить "работу", но собрался с мыслями, разобрался и был в дальнейшем вознаграждён.

[h1]Чем больше я слушаю о политике, тем меньше нахожу в ней смысла.[/h1]
[i]Итак, вы решили продолжить и что же вас ожидает? Ну, из мелочей всего лишь классный сюжет, с кучей великолепных кат - сцен и запоминающихся моментов, очень много проработанных дополнительных заданий с невероятной вариативностью и множеством способов прохождения, не очень большой, но шикарно проработанный и живой открытый мир, в котором у всех НПС есть свой распорядок дня и они почти никогда не стоят на месте, классный саундтрек, шикарные диалоги практически без воды, множество активностей и конечно же, куча навыков, прокачивая которые мы реально видим результат и растём вместе с нашим лоботрясом Индро. 
Вообще, мне кажется, что в плане ощущения роста персонажа (ни как личности, а скиллов), "Кингдом CUM" - одна из лучших, если не лучшая игра. Начинаем мы за необразованного сына кузнеца, который в те годы даже не имел возможности научиться читать, а про его навыки обращения с мечом и другим оружием я промолчу. И это всё мы прочувствуем именно с точки зрения геймплея. Сначала Индржих едва будет способен справиться с одним врагом, а потом и трое ему будут не помеха. 
Кстати, об этом.... Боевая система.., сколько же её макали в дерьмо и унижали, сколько игроков слетело в первые 2 часа именно из - за скандально известной боёвки. Я же скажу так. Да, она далека от идеала и местами очень кривая, при этом ей явно лучше, когда файт происходит 1 на 1 (В такой манере ей помогает раскрыться ДЛС про Турнир"), но блин, сколько же в неё вложено. Каждый доспех ощущается по - разному, звуки из лязганья просто богоподобны, как и звуки ударов по ним, вес реально имеет значение, как и оружие в руках и просто закликивать врагов не выйдет, нужно действовать с умом. Про себя скажу, что я не просто привык, а полюбил эту боёвку, но в сиквеле хочется, конечно, парочку исправлений для неё.[/i]

[h1]Плохое в жизни странника то, что его путь может закончиться, даже не начавшись[/h1]

А теперь я вкратце использую тезисы, которые увидел в одном из лучших обзоров на эту игру в стиме и скажу, почему плюсы с лёгкостью могут превращаться и в минусы, если на них смотреть другими глазами:

Попытка создать реалистичную боёвку, которая ощущается как шахматная дуэль? Пфф, при драке с толпой это будет похоже на избиение, ведь Индро не способен моментально переключаться от одного врага к другому и приходится постоянно следить, чтобы никто не зашёл сзади, иначе смерть. Душно? Довольно.

Великолепный открытый мир? Ну, он маленький и условных активностей в нём не так, чтобы уж много. Да, встречаются всякие странники и кто - то хочет подраться, кто - то загадывает загадки, порой видишь изобретательные засады, но всё это через время уже начинает повторяться и неслабо утомляет.

Живые НПС со своим распорядком дня? Ну что ж, готовьтесь искать их по полчаса, чтобы сдать или взять квест, а если он ещё постоянно куда - то ходит, то ловить его где - то. Временами придётся ждать, проматывая время, чтобы также взять или продолжить какой - то квест, а ещё не всем понравится временное ограничение для выполнения некоторых заданий, причём ты об этом даже не подозреваешь, т.к только что выполнил с десяток квестов, которые совершенно были неограничены во времени, а тут такой удар под дых

[h3]И вот такими методами можно превратить любой плюс в минус и наоборот. Всё зависит от того, что вы любите и как выдержите тот самый порог вхождения. Для меня же большинство механик оказались именно плюсом, а не духотой, из -за чего я считаю "Kingdom Come: Deliverance" практически шедевром (с учётом того, что я не прикасался к игре почти 7 лет) и лично не испытывал на себе версию 2018 года, хотя видел, что там происходило. Тот самый путь от хейтеров и горстки фанатов, к большому количеству фанатов и малому оставшихся хейтеров, что подтверждает большой ажиотаж перед выходом сиквела. Ждём его и молимся или играем и наслаждаемся, если читаете после 4 февраля 2025 года, ведь Вавра - Гений и он не может нас подвести)




[h1] Оценка: 9.0[/h1]

[h1] Оценка, если бы я играл в игру в 2018 с тем техническим состоянием: 8.0[/h1] | 이게임을 키는 순간 나는 이 좆만한 땅 헬조선 시골지방 반지하 구석탱이 천장에서 물이새고 바퀴벌레랑 뽀시락뽀시락거리며 사는 내가 아닌 1403년 보헤미아 왕국의 스칼리츠에 사는 대장장이의 아들 헨리로 재탄생한다 | One of the best and most immersive RPG's to come out in a very long time. Game is very frustrating and hard at the beginning but slowly becomes easier. Great story and fun twists, plus the game is expanded with DLCs.

There needs to be more games like this. Historical Adventure RPG. Beautiful graphics. Great music. Great storytelling based on actual history. Great, memorable characters. And yes, while it's true the gameplay can be a bit wonky and buggy, it's certainly not the worst and you get used to it as you play a bit longer. It would be great if those buggy mechanics were fixed, but it didn't really intervene with my personal enjoyment of the game or stop me from playing it. The game was too rich and immersive an experience to quit.

This game can definitely be a bit challenging, as a warning for players not looking for much difficulty in a game. Otherwise, it's very exciting and so much to keep you busy with. There so much love and level of detail in this game. The world design in the historic setting was stunning and really compelling. Landscapes are intricately crafted. Villages were detailed and vibrant. Overall, I really enjoyed the richness of this game. You can get lost in it.

This game is by far the most amazing single player experience I've played since Skyrim and Fallout4. Draws you in the realism of the historical world. Engaging experience. Well worth playing. My best advice is to practice and get familiar with combat with the trainer in game. Captain Robard will let you practice as long as it takes.

SCORE: 8.5

I feel quite hungry for Kingdom Come Deliverance II ! | Spiel das Spiel! Oder ich lasse dich in den Pranger stellen!

Die Story ist packend, die Landschaft atemberaubend, und die NPCs haben ein Gedächtnis wie Elefanten – verprügelst du den Schmied betrunken vor der Schenke, erinnert er sich eine Woche später noch daran. „Nun, das wird Konsequenzen haben…“ – ja, das ist wohl das Motto meines gesamten Spieldurchlaufs.

Und dann wären da noch die Kämpfe. Mein erster Schwertkampf? Ein Desaster. Mein zweiter? Immer noch ein Desaster. Mein dritter? Überraschenderweise auch ein Desaster. Doch irgendwann trifft man dann doch mal jemanden – meistens sich selbst mit der eigenen Klinge. Spoiler: Irgendwann hat mans raus :)

Das Speichersystem? „Bist du betrunken?“ Nein, aber wenn ich keinen Retterschnaps mehr habe, dann bin ich bald betrunken oder tot. Oder beides.

Wenn du ein realistisches Mittelalter-RPG suchst, bei dem du nach einem Sturz von einem Hügel eher stirbst als nach einem Schwerthieb, du beim Schlösserknacken mehr Türen kaputt machst als öffnest und du regelmäßig von Hühnern beim Diebstahl erwischt wirst – dann ist Kingdom Come: Deliverance genau das richtige Spiel für dich.

Wenn du ein Spiel suchst, in dem du wegen schmutziger Kleidung schief angeschaut wirst, du beim Schlösserknacken mehr Dietriche zerbrichst als Burgtore und deine größte Leistung das erfolgreiche Aufsatteln eines Pferdes ist – dann ist Kingdom Come: Deliverance genau dein Ding.

Rating:

🔪 Kampfsystem: 9/10
Realistischer als mir lieb ist. Kämpfe fühlen sich intensiv und belohnend an – sobald man aufhört, wie ein verwirrtes Huhn um sich zu fuchteln.

📖 Story & Atmosphäre: 10/10
Historisch akkurat, mit spannenden Charakteren und Dialogen. Perfekt für alle, die mal ein RPG ohne Drachen und Magie wollen – nur mit Steuerhinterziehung und Hungersnot.

🏇 Open World: 9/10
Böhmen ist wunderschön. Ich verbringe 50 % meiner Zeit damit, die Landschaft zu genießen – die anderen 50 % verlaufe ich mich im Wald.

🛠️ Realismus: 11/10
Schmutzige Kleidung macht dich verdächtig, Wunden müssen versorgt werden, und wenn du zu oft trinkst, bist du halt betrunken. Ein mittelalterliches Hardcore-Simulator-Erlebnis.

💰 Wirtschaft & Handel: 8/10
Der Schmied zahlt mir 3 Groschen für eine perfekt erhaltene Ritterrüstung, aber verlangt 20 für ein Stück Brot. Mittelalterliche Inflationskrise vom Feinsten.

⚔️ Schwierigkeitsgrad: 10/10
Die ersten Spielstunden sind brutaler als jeder Soulsborne-Titel. Aber wenn du das durchstehst, wirst du mit einem der besten RPG-Erlebnisse belohnt.

OG Career Mode! One of the greatest football simulators! Playing non-steam version for today with patches and still like it so much! Have like thousands hours ! | One of the last PES games. Remember the times when it was that battle "FIFA vs PES" | reliquia | ddcsdxc

Monster Train is a deck-building game. It's following in the footsteps of other great games like Slay the Spire. As a result, I will be comparing this game to Slay the Spire a lot.

In Monster Train, you defend a train full of (you guessed it) monsters. You fight a series of battles, with each battle involving a bunch of minor enemies followed by a major (boss) enemy. In-between battles you do some deck construction using various stations. One run takes about 60 to 90 minutes.

I've gotten 85 hours of fun out of this game.

THE GOOD:
- Monster Train is a really fun card battler.
- The train level mechanic, where you have 4 different levels in your train, adds a lot of strategic depth and novelty.
- You can always refuse a new card or artifact, something I always wished I could do in Slay the Spire—which would force me to take cards I didn't want and then make it really hard to get rid of them.
- It's also easier to remove cards you don't want, often allowing you to craft the deck you want by the endgame.
- The game lets you know who the major bosses are at the very start of the run. This allows you to build your deck accordingly.
- Great variety of enemies, cards, and special abilities.
- Great learning curve, as new concepts are gradually introduced so you don't have to drink from a firehose of knowledge.
- Nice graphics and music.

THE BAD:
- There is no real story to the game. There's kind of the veneer of a story, but it doesn't really explain why you need to do multiple runs.
- Even with the better control over your deck than other games in the genre, you are still at the mercy of the random number generator. It can be frustrating to lose because you never found the cards you needed, or because of a terrible draw for an otherwise great deck.
- The game developers claim this game is a roguelike, but it's not really. You play to unlock new features, which is a good tutorial mechanic, but to be a roguelike the game should require you to learn by failing. I won on my second attempt.

THE UGLY:
- In this game the protagonists are the demons of Hell, and you actually fight against Heavenly angels. This doesn't bother me, but you might find it offensive.
- When using a mouse and dragging a card to play it, if you linger the game can automatically scroll up to a level above. This is a great way to ruin your battle by playing the card on the wrong level!
- The game enables you to ramp up the difficulty with a feature called the Covenant. This is ostensibly a good thing that gives the game some extra life and challenge. Unfortunately, in trying to find a variety of ways to increase the difficulty the game designer has mainly made the game more annoying. They add lots of junk cards to your deck and make it harder to remove those cards. Hence, rather than ending with a bang, the game kind of fizzled out with a whimper as I got increasingly frustrated and quit.
 | I'll be honest. I didn't like it that much. Primarily because the game at higher difficults devolves into gigagbuffing one monster to solo the final boss. Still though learning the game was great. | I played this roguelite cards battler on various platforms, gamepass pc ,xbox and steam, and its a great game. Fun. 
For me the progression of the game is really good, while you play more you unlock fun other stuff. The combinations are a blast, you can make over the top OP cards. I like the sounds when the train is totaly full and your cards all packed with buffs, the sound is not beautiful, but catching, and I like the raw sound of the abilities clashing into each other.
Its cool and easy to play some rounds, make comobs and have fun.
Game is fun and well made, for sure worth your time

Что могу сказать из 2025 наиграв чуть более 100 часов. 

Как продукт сам по себе - игра хороша. Оптимизация на месте, графоний услада для глаз, детализация отпад. На этом всё.

А вот теперь, почему я её не рекомендую тем, кто любит в тактику и стратегию:

1. Вы не будете видеть карту вблизи 99% времени (только птичий полёт), хотите смотреть от первого лица так сказать - это только режим паузы.
2. ИИ в любом режиме и любой сложности просто спамит войсками. 75% всех каток и войск врага это марш фарша по дорогам до (очень важно именно ДО, об этот пункт 3) места контакта минус 10 метров назад. Далее просто кучами закидывает своих ботов с одной единственной целью подавление (численное превосходство в местах контакта) в лоб.
3. В любом режиме кроме онлайн с другими игроками, бот всегда на 10 метров дальше от любого вашего орудия вне зоны поражения. Любой даже самый малый участок непросвета при остальном полном засвете по направлению, бот будет там. Ни влево ни вправо, только точки без засвета (это относится к ключевой и дальнобойной технике врага, пушечное мясо как рой пчёл лезет только в лоб). 
4. За кого бы вы не играли в одиночке, бот всегда точнее (су 76 -  5 попаданий в центр огневой точки из 5. 1 из 5 попало в свою же воронку) Для сравнения 3 миномёта с моей стороны под командиром и радио 9 выстрелами не убили один миномёт врага, точнее убили бы если бы хоть 1 из 9 снарядом попал хотя бы рядом) И это постоянная фигня, не напрягает во время игры, просто я за адекватность)))
5. Из за масштабности событий охватить всю карту разом не получится, если у вас монитор конечно не во всю стену. Отсюда ещё один незначительный, но сильно бесючий момент - пока вы смотрите или контрите одно направление в момент времени, и вроде всё ровно, чуть дальше за приделами видимости, враг творит дичь, стоит вам туда перенести камеру, там сразу всё ровно, но дичь свалила чуть левее (типа один снайпер  заспамил пулемётный дот) как только вы это увидели, сразу ок, либо перестаёт стрелять по нему, либо пулемётная точка решила собраться с силами и прогнала снайпера именно прогнала в панике, а не убила, стоит отвернуться, всё опять таже фигня. Как ещё пример, отправляешь бомбардировщика на танк и ведёшь его, всё ок и стреляет и даже убивает, стоит отдать приказ и отвести взгляд, либо будет летать почему то кругами без атаки над целью, либо вжарит тупо мимо, даже не рядом, а просто в том направлении хоть и по засвету.
6. Из 5 вытекает 6, смотреть красоту вблизи некогда, всегда метаешься по карте глазами, даже если всё под контролем, просто для того  чтобы твои солдатики не тупили пока ты на них не смотришь. Как только залюбовался подбитым танком врага без паузы и потерял карту из виду, всё, в какой-то её части обязательно случится то, что не может случиться или не случилось бы если бы вы смотрели в этот момент туда.
7. Не совсем понятная логика окончания сражений. Вроде есть цель на конец сценария или раунда и вроде только-только начинаешь готовиться к спланированному наступлению по направлению. Бац, катка закончена, враг сдался (я ничего ещё не сделал толком, только фаза Б началась, только танки подкатили, только только начал предвкушать как этого спамера начнёшь давить, но нет 45 минут из жизни), Но если тебе ооооочень нужно выиграть и вдруг что-то пошло не так, даже не смотря на то, что никаких прорывов в твоё линии обороны нет и ты планомерно и медленно выдавливаешь врага (предположим в генерале армии не всегда в боях бывают нужные дивизии и ты тупо солдатиками и пушками), то этот бред будет длиться чуть ли не до полного уничтожения всех заявленных дивизий врага в бою. т.е. 1.5-2 часа из жизни минус. По итогу - если хотите устроить дичь и наказать врага, НЕТ - 9 и 10 раз, а то и 10 из 10 вы этого не сделаете. Бот тупо закончит миссию (типа сдался, вы победили и получили какую нибудь незначительную победу, когда шли к полной победе на все 100).

Из таких вот мелочей будет складываться ваша одиночная игра, мультиплеер имеет свои моменты (там баллом правят те, кто с вики и факами спит по этой игре, но в целом весело).

К хорошему могу ещё добавить разве что то, что всё же игра действительно насыщенная и масштабная и под тоже пивко или чаёк вечерняя катка вам принесёт скорее положительные эмоции, чем негатив и желание удалить эту дичь с компа навсегда. Ах да, брать лучше по скидосу, фулл прайс она не стоит однозначно. |

Reviews: I had this game when it first came out and I play it for nostalgia. Fun to play as a group. Vasari space stations rule the void. | 4Т КОМОСТРАТЕГИЯ | worth the money even for it's age | Play the new one

Game Name: Sins of a Solar Empire®: Rebellion
Reviews:
This game has the reputation of being one of the best RTS games, but I don't really see it. It straddles the line between traditional/action RTS (think WC3/SC:BW or AoE2) and 4X (Stellaris, Endless Space 2) and ultimately ends up not being terribly good on either front.
Maybe I haven't delved deep enough, apparently there are people who invest hundreds of hours into this, but I'm just not hooked after a couple of games against the AI. Pass. | It would be great if not for titans - it destroy fun and make it unplayable. 0/10 You can not turn them off. | Впервые встречаю стратегию где нет кампании, но игра, хорошая. Вазари с их порталами рулят! но и у остальных свои приколы тоже есть. 10 из 10 планетарных бомбардировок уже колонизированных планет за ЧТК! | Sins of a Solar Empire

Genres: Action, Casual, Indie, RPG, Simulation, Strategy, Early Access
Reviews:
The game isn't bad by any means, however, I feel like the video's need to better show off how the combat and general scale of the game actually looks. For a time before trying the game I had thought the game was more or less like Stellaris, or something akin to Sins of a Solar Empire. But was rather disappointed by the general map size/scale. The game seems much smaller than I had anticipated. That's by no means a bad thing, but I will say I personally prefer a larger scale scenario.

Overall, I would highly recommend you try the game at least, and try the tutorial as it allows you to figure out the game slowly and at your own pace without risk of being curb stomped by an AI. But will say, you can probably explore everything the game currently has to offer within said tutorial. Which for me, took less than an hour. I could maybe see this game being fun in the future, and maybe a lot will change in time. But I can only recommend the game to those who prefer smaller scale space combat with a bit more of a unique 3d twist to it. If I had to compare it to anything, it'd be like Age of Empires mixed with some kind of space rts, but not as much of a grand rts as either could be considered. Its very much cinematically interesting, but not so much in the RTS aspect.

I recommend the game however regardless of my personal un-enjoyment of the game, because I can see the promise in it and that those who aren't quite to the grand scale of rts yet, can find some more comfort in something a bit more instantly action packed, if not slightly smaller scale than say something like Stellaris, Sins of a Solar Empire, or games of said scale. It's very much a cozy kind of game, but it simply isn't for me at this current moment.

Something I would enjoy more, is having the ability to build more than one building at a time, rather than queing up blueprints of where I want to build more. While also being allowed to que up buildings even if I don't have the resources. I also wish getting the experimental ships was more grand rather than them simply popping into existence once you purchase them via the resources. Also, having a total ship cap of only 40 seems rather small in the grand scheme of things. Not sure if that was only for the tutorial, but either way, not a entirely great experience having so few ships fighting. Will also say, the sun launcher is a bit... OP and I can see it being something a lot of people immediately rush towards in the game to immediately win. Its pretty expensive, but if you know how to manage resources for defense and expansion, there won't be much your enemy can do to stop you from just rushing towards that, surrounding it in defensive platforms and artillery, and hunkering down till you're ready to launch it at the enemies shipyard. Where you have to hope you upgraded it enough to tank the explosion and impact as well as the directional damage. Even if it fails at destroying the shipyard, it basically cripples you to death ensuring a easy cleanup. | This game while amazing. is a HOT mess when it comes to the graphical settings. You can choose 5120x1440 but there is no way to apply it. You cannot skip the tutorial despite the option being available it doesn't work. 

The intro is ear F**king .... | oyun öğreticisini oynar iseniz oyun ondan sonra çok iyi bir anlayabilirsiniz ve oyunu anlayarak daha çok zevk alabilirsiniz. Ben şahsen oyunu beğendim ama oyundaki tek bir kötü tarafı var o ise oyunda online tarafı çok fazla aktif değil. | 最新アップデートで日本語に対応された。キャンペーンも日本語化されているので、ハードルは下がったと思う。 | Really cool game. Each match plays like old homeworld ship combat and has a deckbuilder/shipbuilder metagame setup outside of matches that you use for all game modes. Destroying any ships unlocks new weapons and ship types and its play to unlock stuff and quick unlocks
Bases are static but built in 3d space so can get creative with layouts and building up economy and teching up has good pace in this game I think so multiplayer pvp should be quite fun.
Map control is important so you get more resources to get more eco/more tech and of course more ships

Also buy this game.

I've spent so many hours on this game it's painful
The purest deck builder there is, an absolute masterpiece of a game. | This is a much better execution of this game than prior versions.  Nice job.

Катарсис , писал Аристотель, должно дарить произведение искусства. Особенно, когда оно заставляет сопереживать, грустить, радоваться... Вот этого создателям игры удалось добиться, кинематографистам многим поучиться нужно. Классная атмосфера игры, основанная на потрясающем произведении В.Тихова, эдаком литературном осмыслении быличек и страшилок северных регионов России, - просто до головы затягивает и погружает в мир русского Севера начала 20 века. С удовольствием сопереживал Василисе на ее пути, с огромным наслаждением читал былички (а читать их обязательно - в них подсказки игроку на будущие вопросы и испытания), слушал песни. А боевая карточная система заговоров прям добавила глубины. Разобрался с ней , правда, не сразу, а как дошло, то играть стало просто в наслаждение. В общем, эта игра огромный труд , сделанный с любовью к русскому фольклору и истории. Браво, разработчики!!! | Tbh, game is quiet good in the start - the lore and the premise is perfect but i do feel like the story is TOO long.  The momentum it built went down the drain as tasks became too repetitive. Sad though as the game is promising. | Хороша игра!
Очень хорошая озвучка, песни
Тексты все интересные 
Визуальный стиль для меня странный, но фоны красота!
Как оказалось я правда не фанат ККИ) 
Сначала решала где можно игрой в карты, но наскучило и, чтоб не забросить, стала пропускать сражения. Очень хорошо что есть такая возможность! 
Если захотите проходить, то чтобы посмотреть все концовки, можете до срыва первой печати накопить 100 греха или около того. Тогда последнего действия вам вполне хватит чтобы рассмотреть другие варианты). Ну, кроме еще одного, но там прям всю игру жестить надо | Very lovely game with great atmosphere. You can really feel the nature of people from the time od 19th century of Russia.

A lot of mythology and folkloric stuff around.

Love it! But some puzzles can be challenging. | Black Book is an excellent game that's lead by its story.
Do not mistakenly think it's a "rogue-alike card battler" because of the tags on Steam; it's not so basic like that, it's not Slay the Spire.
This is a story-driven RPG, where combat takes the form of a "card battler" using the titular Black Book's pages to order to cast spells (offensive and defensive).
It's story-first, voice-acted, and has you making your way through the countryside to your objectives' locations, where you can choose to bee-line there or explore side locales. Being a card battler is simply how combat is played in this game. The combat is well-designed, taking cues from Slay the Spire with providing you the info on what the enemy is going to do on their next turn as well as most of your spells being attacks or putting up protective shields on you or your ally (your choice).

Because the story & everything are rooted in Slavic mythology, there may be times when you're asked something and given a choice between several words you don't know. You can look them up online real quick, but fear not as these situations give you no penalty for being wrong and only a bonus of XP if you choose correctly - smart.


The DLC looks for be more like Slay the Spire as a "rogue-alike card battler" but IMHO that's reductive and misses out entirely on the point of Black Book: the story.

The game is somewhat fun, but super basic, with an AI that categorically cannot use it's own mechanics such as spell-casting. Sometimes it tries to buff your units, sometimes it wastes buffs on units that won't don't have AP to use them before they run out. Graphical glitches abound, voice acting is so-so, the difficulty is meh, the complexity - what complexity?

Oh and all the achievements no longer unlock. Don't buy it.
